thread.section_title: The Inn At The Roman Forum - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: absolutely perfect!
thread.title_full: absolutely perfect! - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Sazzle256
title: absolutely perfect!
text:
loved this beautiful place - from the moment we checked in , we were made to feel very special. The rooms, the staff ( desk & restaurant) , the food , the location - all just perfect
we loved the prosecco & ( the best ever) tiramisu upon chek-in the crypt !
we loved the sandwiches, wine & pistachos in our room
we loved the turn down service
we LOVED our breakfast !! have the cake !
we loved the lovely, comfy bed
Room Tip: we had room 301 ...perfect See more room tips
